title: The Torments of Hell
description: The Torments of Hell; Master of the Oxford Hours (French, active about 1440s); Nantes (probably), France; about 1440 - 1450; Tempera colors, gold and silver paint on parchment; Leaf: 36.2 x 27.3 cm (14 1/4 x 10 3/4 in.); Ms. Ludwig XI 10, fol. 217; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
